be.ugent.oomo.groep12.studgent.utilities
Class CurlUtil

java.lang.Object
  be.ugent.oomo.groep12.studgent.utilities.CurlUtil

public class CurlUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class to fetch content from url Provides basic caching method for speed improvements. Has option to ignore the cache to force a refresh
